name: The Space Between Us
description:
We’re all messed up and scared and trying to be something that we’re not. If we all went around just declaring our innermost desires to the exact people we felt them for, well, then we’d all end up happy, or something. And so I have to live because we live for more than just ourselves.

________________________
Basic work using Chinese ink on paper and then working through digital media.
IMAGE/GIF
3508 X 2480 PX
2020
